name: StarCruiser 3000
description:
This is a short game about going for a cruise in space. Sit back, relax and enjoy the ride.

  • W, A, S, D - Drive
  • Spacebar - Activate Warp
  • Esc - Menu
  • F10 - Screenshot

Programming and 3D Models: John-Evans Wagenaar

Music: DST (http://www.nosoapradio.us/)

Planet Textures: http://freebitmaps.blogspot.co.uk/
